verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a man of action and a partner in prison reform for forgotten communities of Americans] . These pardons are just the beginning , writes Pastor Darrell Scott , who heads the National Diversity Coalition for Trump .
